channel.title: Agility Ticket Cash Shop [DELTA] [PICS]
channel.description:
[SIZE=12pt]I call this a noob guide cause Im a noob and I know it will help other noobs :D. [/SIZE]
Ok the first thing you want to do is open up your Client.java file and search for something like this
[CODE]if (command.startsWith[/CODE]
Then add copy this code below and paste it under the last[b]}[/b] you see
[CODE]if (command.startsWith("sell") && playerHasItem(2996)) { addItem(995, 500000000); deleteItem(2996, 1); }[/CODE]
so it should look like this now
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/Agilitycode.jpg[/img]
This will give you a command when you type ::sell in game you must have agility ticket on you to receive 500mil gp for each time you type the command
Okay heres the confusing part for you new coders Kinda, Ill try to make it easy...:)
In client.java Look for this code.
[CODE]WanneShop =[/CODE]
Next you want to find a empty shop or a shop your not using at the moment, I ll explain how you do this before we move on.. First In your folder with the Client.java folder look for a folder called Config
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/Configfolder.jpg[/img]
Open that up and look for a file called Shops "no picture needed" and Open that up.
You'll see a list of shops that are in your game, Okay remember how i asked you to look up this code. [CODE]WanneShop =[/CODE]
Were gonna use that code to figure out what shop we need thats empty or were not using By comparing the Information with what information is in the Shops file you just opened
Take a look at this picture Below You Should be looking at something like this on your screen its okay if the numbers are different. Okay in this case the shop number I am going to be using is 14 *circled in red also titled "A"* the Code circled in purple is the npc Number i will be putting in my auto spawn later, okay next ..
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/wanneshop.jpg[/img]
We go to your shops file and look for the same shop number as circled in red below.
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/shopjava.jpg[/img]
Once you found the shop your going add your Agility ticket codes in In this case mine are 2996 as shown in the picture above The number to the right of 2996 is the amount thats going to be sold in the shop change this if you'd like.
Once you've done all that You willl Have to change the price of the Agility Tickets which is pretty simple to do. Go back in your config folder [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/Configfolder.jpg[/img]
Open up the file called [B]Item.cfg[/B] Very important you use this file and [B]NOT[/B] the one labeled Item.java
Once in there Search for [QUOTE]Agility_arena_ticket[/QUOTE]
You'll see these 3 numbers I circled in Orange, Change those three 1's to 500000000 [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/Itemagil.jpg[/img]
Now Go back to your Client.java file and get the NpcID of the shop, In this case its 585 *circled in purple labeled "B" [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/wanneshop.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt] If you know how to do auto spawn then save all your files that you have edited Compile then restart your server and your all done, If you don't keep reading ill guide you threw this last step.[/size]
Go back into your config folder And open up a file called Autospawn.CFG you'll see a line of numbers Copy with your mouse what i circled in the picture below *your numbers may be different but copy the pattern I copied.*
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/Autospawn.jpg[/img]
Change your NpcID number to the one you got off the Client.java file, go to where you would like your shop to be at and type ::mypos or ::mycoords and type your coordinates in the code in autospawn accordingly, Once you have done all this you are almost finished, Just save all the folders I had you edit, then compile and RUN
I really hoped this help and you can use the main code i put in here for almost anything change it up a bit and enjoy ;) heres what it looks like when your finished
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss65/Casey_Boyd/Pictureagili.jpg[/img]
And once you have done all that Save ALL the files you edited, Compile and restart your server The reason i made this command was because its easier to do the having to mess around with the percentage that the shop automatically takes off which is 30% of the original price from any item, so be sure to tell your players not to sell there tickets back but use this command instead. ;)
[size=14pt]Credits 100% to __Allranger__ :D[/size]
[size=18pt]comment please[/size]

item.title: Agility Ticket Cash Shop [DELTA] [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“byebyebye, post:16, topic:338155”][quote author=byebyebye link=topic=434552.msg3266597#msg3266597 date=1278900042]
Question, My runserver says

Exception in thread "main" java.lang ArrayIndexOutOfBounds:17
           at ItemHandler.loadItemList<ItemHandler.java:283>
           at ItemHandler.<init><ItemHandler.java:173>
           at server.main<server.java:112>

Need help cause people can’t log in to server until it’s fixed!!
[/quote]

PLEASE GUYS HELP ME!![/quote]

You did something wrong when you edited something in:

Item.cfg
Shops.cfg (or whatever)
or
AutoSpawn.cfg.

Make sure it is (sells items?) (Buys Items?) (item id?) (amount?) at shops.cfg

(item = (itemid) (itemname) (item desc,) (price-shops) (price low-alch) (price high-alch) (all those stats) at item.cfg

spawn(or whatever) = (npcid) (X) (Y) (H) (Walks to X1) (Walks to Y1) (Walks to X2) (Walks to Y2) (Walktype) at autospawn

I may be wrong, but that’s what is how my configs look.
Also, note that this is for Delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Agility Ticket Cash Shop [DELTA] [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:22, topic:338155”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=434552.msg3458665#msg3458665 date=1294270267]
Wait. So you buy a ticket for 500m. Then you can type ::sell and sell said ticket for 500m.

What’s the point of this?
[/quote]

if you read the thread he explained it was a way to bypass max cash limit… say you have like 2b and you have more items to sell just buy tickets to store the extra cash in and retrieve it later, or you could use for extreme trades (eg offering several tickets for rarest items)[/quote]

Ah, missed that. Thanks for clearing it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Agility Ticket Cash Shop [DELTA] [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:21, topic:338155”]Wait. So you buy a ticket for 500m. Then you can type ::sell and sell said ticket for 500m.

What’s the point of this?[/quote]

if you read the thread he explained it was a way to bypass max cash limit… say you have like 2b and you have more items to sell just buy tickets to store the extra cash in and retrieve it later, or you could use for extreme trades (eg offering several tickets for rarest items)

Read full topic

item.title: Agility Ticket Cash Shop [DELTA] [PICS]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Actually, it can handle 2,147,483,647. because that is thought to be the highest number any java engine can produce.
But is in fact only if we are using the first modifier to denote + or - in a positive only number situation. It can handle as high as: 4,294,967,294.

Read full topic

@_ZeroScape wrote:

Want more than max cash ingame?
Why ain’t anyone trying what I did when I started?
I made a bank system with the commands ::deposit ::withdraw and ::amount …
Although dont make the bank handle more than 2147M, as Java can’t handle it :b!

Good Luck (Nice guide and idea, 3/10) Good use of pictures
